price: 156. Mpe bosala ye mabe te, noki te, etumbu monene ekozua bino mokolo moko boye.
arabic: وَلَا تَمَسُّوهَا بِسُوٓءٖ فَيَأۡخُذَكُمۡ عَذَابُ يَوۡمٍ عَظِيمٖ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: walā tamassūhā bisūin fayakhudhakum ʿadhābu yawmin ʿaẓīmin
